footer.title: Polis
footer.desc: DigiFinland and Sitra have introduced the Polis online platform in Finland, based on open source code. The purpose of Polis is to enable large groups to participate in constructive exchanges of opinions around selected topics.

signin.test_warning_text: Use only for testing, do not share links.

password.title: Password Reset
password.reset_check_email_link: Check your email for a password reset link

integrate.title: Integrate
integrate.text1: Copy and paste this code into your content management template. Each page (article, post) requires a unique string in the 'PAGE_ID' field. This should be consistent over time and unique to each of your pages (like the article title).
integrate.text2: When this embed code loads on your website, it will either create a new conversation (if one is not already associated with the string passed into PAGE_ID) or load an existing conversation.
integrate.text3: This embed code will keep track of what conversations belongs on what pages via the data-page_id HTML attribute.
integrate.text4: Simply replace 'PAGE_ID', either manually or in your templates, to create new conversations and load existing ones in the right place.

configure.title: Configure
configure.conversation_open: Conversation is open. Unchecking disables both voting and commenting.
configure.help_type: Show explanation text above voting and visualization
configure.strict_moderation: No comments shown without moderator approval

distribute.title: Distribute
distribute.desc: This embed code can only be used to embed a single conversation.
distribute.link: I want to integrate pol.is on my entire site.

stats.title: Monitor
stats.commenters: Commenters over time, by time of first comment
stats.voters: Voters over time, by time of first vote
